name: Family Ties (brendantuliao)
description:
Once you start, you will be navigating a spider who has lost her eggs deep beneath the ground. Help her find them against odds with the many creatures and obstacles that will try to hurt her.

Art: bruhmoment#4125, esturtle#6201

Programming: Esha^2#3473, redtrek#3817, listerine#0504

Sound: esturtle#6201
